name: Wireless Noise-Canceling Headphones
description: Premium over-ear headphones with active noise cancellation, 30-hour battery life, and comfortable memory foam cushions. Bluetooth 5.2 with multipoint connection.

name: Mechanical Gaming Keyboard
description: Full-size mechanical keyboard with Cherry MX Brown switches, RGB per-key lighting, and aluminum frame. USB-C with passthrough.

name: 4K Webcam with Ring Light
description: 4K Ultra HD webcam with built-in ring light, autofocus, and noise-reducing microphones. Perfect for streaming and video calls.

name: Ergonomic Standing Desk
description: Electric height-adjustable standing desk with memory presets, cable management, and bamboo desktop. Lifts up to 300lbs.

name: Ultrawide Curved Monitor 34"
description: 34-inch ultrawide curved monitor with UWQHD resolution, 144Hz refresh rate, and 1ms response time. USB-C with 90W power delivery.

name: Mesh Office Chair
description: Fully adjustable ergonomic mesh chair with lumbar support, adjustable armrests, and breathable back. Supports up to 300lbs.

name: Portable SSD 2TB
description: Compact external SSD with 2TB capacity and 1050MB/s read speeds. USB-C and USB-A compatible, shock-resistant design.

name: Smart Home Hub
description: Central smart home controller with voice assistant, Matter support, and compatibility with 10,000+ devices. Thread and Zigbee built-in.

name: Wireless Charging Pad 3-in-1
description: Charge your phone, watch, and earbuds simultaneously. 15W fast charging for phones, MagSafe compatible, foldable travel design.

name: Laptop Backpack with USB
description: Water-resistant laptop backpack with USB charging port, anti-theft pocket, and padded laptop compartment. Fits up to 17-inch laptops.

name: USB-C Docking Station
description: 12-in-1 USB-C hub with dual 4K HDMI, 100W power delivery, Gigabit Ethernet, and SD card slots. Universal laptop compatibility.

name: Espresso Machine Automatic
description: Fully automatic espresso machine with built-in grinder, milk frother, and touch display. Makes espresso, cappuccino, and latte.

name: Robot Vacuum with Mop
description: LiDAR navigation robot vacuum with mopping function, auto-empty dock, and app control. 180-minute runtime on single charge.

name: Fitness Smartwatch
description: Advanced fitness watch with GPS, heart rate monitoring, sleep tracking, and 100+ workout modes. 7-day battery life.

name: Air Purifier HEPA
description: True HEPA air purifier covering up to 1500 sq ft. Removes 99.97% of particles, allergens, and odors. Smart sensor auto-adjusts.

name: Wireless Earbuds Pro
description: Premium wireless earbuds with adaptive noise cancellation, spatial audio, and 8-hour battery life. IPX4 water resistant.

name: Smart LED Desk Lamp
description: Eye-care LED desk lamp with wireless charging base, adjustable color temperature, and smart home integration.

name: Portable Power Station 500W
description: Portable power station with 500W output and 518Wh capacity. Solar panel compatible, perfect for camping and emergencies.

name: Electric Kettle Variable Temp
description: Gooseneck electric kettle with variable temperature control, pour-over mode, and 60-minute keep warm. Ideal for coffee and tea.

name: Thunderbolt 4 Cable 2m
description: Certified Thunderbolt 4 cable supporting 40Gbps data, 100W charging, and 8K video. Braided nylon for durability.
